property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of paths on the local filesystem of a DataNode where it should store its blocks.

property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Path on the local filesystem where the NameNode stores the namespace and transaction logs persistently.

property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host
property.description: IP address on which 'namenode rpc' will listen.
